meta.title: ProCompass Privacy Policy
meta.description: ProCompass privacy policy - Available in Chinese, English, and Japanese

content.intro: This Privacy Policy applies to ProCompass (the "App"). We value your privacy and explain how we collect, use, share, and protect your information.

device.title: 1.1 Device and Usage Data
items: Device information (e.g., model, OS version, language settings).
App usage and interaction events (via Firebase Analytics).

location.title: 1.2 Location Data
items: With your permission, the App uses location services to provide compass and location features.
Location data is used only for display and calculation, not for personalized ads.

sensor.title: 1.3 Sensor Data
items: The App uses motion and direction sensors (e.g., gyroscope, magnetometer, barometer) for compass, speed, and altitude features.

ads.title: 1.4 Ads and Identifiers
items: The App integrates Google AdMob to display ads.
With your consent, AdMob may access the advertising identifier (IDFA) for ad delivery and measurement.

usage.title: 2. How We Use Information
items: Provide and improve core features (compass, location, speed).
Display ads and measure ad performance.
Analyze usage to improve the experience.

thirdParty.title: 3. Sharing and Third-Party Services
thirdParty.intro: We may share necessary information with:

permissions.title: 4. Permissions
items: Motion & Fitness (if applicable): for motion-related data.
Tracking permission (IDFA): for ad delivery and measurement (optional).

security.title: 5. Data Retention & Security
security.text: We take reasonable measures to protect your information. We do not intentionally collect or store personally identifiable information.

choices.title: 6. Your Choices
items: Manage location and tracking permissions in system settings.
Limit personalized ads in iOS settings.

children.title: 7. Children's Privacy
children.text: The App is not intended for children under 13. If you believe we have collected such information, please contact us.

updates.title: 8. Policy Updates
updates.text: We may update this policy from time to time. Updates will be posted here with a revised "Last Updated" date.

contact.title: 9. Contact Us
